Academics

AcademicsAt the USC Leonard Davis School, you can earn an undergraduate gerontology degree, an accelerated five-year undergraduate or graduate degree program, a doctoral degree, or a minor in aging.
Undergraduate Programs

Human Development and Aging (BS)
Lifespan Health (BS)
Minor in Gerontology: Individuals, Societies, and Aging
Minor in Gerontology: Science, Health, and Aging
Minor in Geroscience

The USC Leonard Davis School of Gerontology

We're making  
life aging communities care 
better. 
Leaders in improving health and wellbeing for all ages.Explore our programs

 How to apply


















A Legacy of Excellence




Rooted in a world-class research university and located in one of the most vibrant cities on earth, the USC Leonard Davis School is a global pioneer in gerontology education, research, policy and service. Founded in 1975, we are the world’s first, largest and most renowned educational institution on aging. Through discovery, advocacy and leadership, our faculty, students and alumni are creating the future of aging – and living –  well.


Learn more












Solutions Start Here




USC Leonard Davis School of Gerontology faculty are at the forefront of their fields and are behind scientific breakthroughs that benefit older adults around the world. They drive innovations in genetic research and big data analytics to unlock better treatment and prevention for age-related diseases, explore digital technologies that can support independence, social connection and health, and advance understanding of how to improve living environments for people of all ages.


Learn more


















A Difference You Can Count On


By the Numbers  



 20  million in yearly federal research funding






 3000  alumni making a global impact






 17  world’s largest selection of gerontology programs






 11  current and former faculty members ranked among world’s top 1% of cited scientists



Learn more

Aging is Happening Newsletter

Lessons in Lifespan Health


















Support the USC Leonard Davis School


Our mission is to promote healthy aging for everyone. Your vital support helps us provide the world’s leading education, research and outreach in the fields of aging and geroscience. Thanks to gifts from our generous donors, our students, alumni, faculty, and scientists are improving lives for people of all ages today and for generations to come. With your help, we are not just looking forward to a future of better aging, we are creating it.Give Now
